name: Sing a Rainbow
lyric:
Red and yellow and pink and green

Purple and orange and blue

I can sing a rainbow

Sing a rainbow

Sing a rainbow too
Listen with your eyes
Listen with your eyes
And sing everything you see

You can sing a rainbow
Sing a rainbow
Sing along with me

Red and yellow and pink and green

Purple and orange and blue

I can sing a rainbow

Sing a rainbow

Sing a rainbow too

comments.brief:
温柔 好听

来自iPhone客户端
